findings.author: alex_prompter
findings.text:
Here's the trap everyone falls into:

"build me a login system"

AI: sure! *generates 400 lines*

You: looks right!

6 weeks later: API keys exposed, auth bypassed, database chaos.

The AI wasn't wron

findings.author: alex_prompter
findings.text:
The data is brutal:

‚Üí Developers using AI are 19% SLOWER (while thinking they're faster)
‚Üí Stack Overflow 2025: AI trust crashed from 43% to 33%
‚Üí Pros NEVER let AI handle more than 5-6 steps before

UC San Diego studied how pros actually use AI coding tools.

They don't vibe. They control.
